mapper.insert: insert into VACATION (START_TIME, END_TIME, USER_ID, INSERT_TIME, EDITOR, EDIT_TIME, TYPE, APPROVAL_AUTHORITY) values (#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{userId}, now(), #{editor}, now(), #{type}, #{approvalAuthority})
mapper.select: select v.VACATION_ID, v.START_TIME, v.END_TIME, v.INSERT_TIME, v.STATUS, v.USER_ID, u.`POSITION` aposition, u.NAME aname, v.TYPE, v.APPROVAL_AUTHORITY, u2.`POSITION` bposition, u2.NAME bname from VACATION v join USERS u on v.USER_ID = u.USER_ID join USERS u2 on v.APPROVAL_AUTHORITY = u2.USER_ID where v.DELETE_STATUS = 0 and v.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER by v.INSERT_TIME DESC

select v.VACATION_ID, v.START_TIME, v.END_TIME, v.EDIT_TIME, v.STATUS, v.USER_ID, u.`POSITION` aposition, u.NAME aname, v.TYPE, v.APPROVAL_AUTHORITY, u2.`POSITION` bposition, u2.NAME bname from VACATION v join USERS u on v.USER_ID = u.USER_ID join USERS u2 on v.APPROVAL_AUTHORITY = u2.USER_ID where v.DELETE_STATUS = 0 and v.APPROVAL_AUTHORITY = #{userId} ORDER by v.INSERT_TIME DESC
select VACATION_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, USER_ID, TYPE, APPROVAL_AUTHORITY, INSERT_TIME, EDIT_TIME from VACATION where DELETE_STATUS = 0 and VACATION_ID = #{vacationId}

select v.VACATION_ID, v.START_TIME, v.END_TIME, v.STATUS, v.USER_ID, u.`POSITION` aposition, u.NAME aname, v.TYPE, v.APPROVAL_AUTHORITY, u2.`POSITION` bposition, u2.NAME bname from VACATION v join USERS u on v.USER_ID = u.USER_ID join USERS u2 on v.APPROVAL_AUTHORITY = u2.USER_ID where u.DEPT_ID = ( select DEPT_ID from USERS where USER_ID = #{userId} ) and v.STATUS = 2 and v.DELETE_STATUS = 0
